title: Build meows.live - Live Cat Streaming Platform
description:
Rebrand and adapt sexyca.ms codebase to create meows.live - a live cat streaming platform.

## Source Codebase
- `/Users/ryan/development/sexyca.ms`
- Laravel backend + Next.js frontend
- PostgreSQL database
- Features: Live streaming, chat, operators (cat owners), favorites, messaging

## Rebranding Tasks
1. Update all branding (logos, colors, copy)
2. Rename 'operators' to 'cat streamers' or 'cat parents'
3. Rename 'customers' to 'viewers' or 'cat lovers'
4. Remove adult-oriented features
5. Add cat-specific features (breed tags, cat profiles)
6. Update domain references throughout codebase

## Target Domain
- meows.live

## Related
- cats.center (resource hub) - separate but linked site
testing_plan:
1. Verify all pages load without adult content references
2. Test user registration flow
3. Test streamer registration flow
4. Test live streaming functionality
5. Test chat and messaging
6. Verify mobile responsiveness
rollback_plan: Remove DNS records and k8s deployment if issues occur
